cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
chpasswd:
  list: |
    centos:@@{PASSWORD}@@
  expire: False
ssh_pwauth: True

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
chpasswd:
  list: |
    centos:@@{PASSWORD}@@
  expire: False
ssh_pwauth: True
